function.name: mongo_store
function.description: Stores object in the specified collection, and returns the inserted object. If no “_id” is specified in the object, one will be generated by mongo. The returned object will then also contain the generated id. If object is an associative array (key = value) it will be treated as one document. Otherwise (if it is a list of arrays) it will be treated as a list of documents. If mongo is not provided the last active connection will be used.

example.description: Storing a new person in the “employees” collection:
